Levels 61-70.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 70| OR |Progressive Levels:6|) AND |@Zones 60-70:2|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 70| OR |Progressive Levels:6|) AND |@Zones 60-70:2| AND |Hellfire Peninsula (58-63)|)

Levels 71-80.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 80| OR |Progressive Levels:7|) AND |@Zones 70-80:2|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 80| OR |Progressive Levels:7|) AND |@Zones 70-80:2| AND (|Borean Tundra (68-72)| OR |Howling Fjord (68-72)|))

Levels 81-85.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 85| OR |Progressive Levels:8|) AND |@Zones 80-85:2|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 85| OR |Progressive Levels:8|) AND |@Zones 80-85:2| AND (|Mount Hyjal (80-82)| OR |Vashj'ir (80-82)|))

Levels 86-90.requires: ({YamlDisabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 90| OR |Progressive Levels:9|) AND |@Zones 85-90:2|) OR ({YamlEnabled(easier_expansion_transition)} AND (|Maximum Level 90| OR |Progressive Levels:9|) AND |@Zones 85-90:2| AND |The Jade Forest (85-86)|)
